desc: Support your Colleyville Colts with our Fan Gear and Personalized Spirit Wear. Colleyville Middle School is located in Colleyville, TX.

layout.text: DEADLINE TO ORDER CMS ATHLETICS WEAR HAS ENDED

Any CMS Athletics Wear orders that occur after July 27th is not guaranteed to deliver before the start of the school year.
Our team will do our best
to fulfill all post-deadline orders
in a timely manner.
PLEASE NOTE: All orders are PRE-ORDERED and will be delivered to your home prior to the school year.
